getOrders

public void getOrders(java.lang.Boolean includeItems,
                      java.lang.Boolean includeProducts,
                      java.sql.Date fromDate,
                      java.sql.Date toDate,
                      DataLoadListener listener)
Search for all order between given date.

Parameters:
includeItems - true if app needs order with all order items (optional)
includeProducts - true if app needs Order with orderItem and product (optional)
fromDate - start period
toDate - end period
listener -

Parameters:
includeProducts - true if includes the product with orderItems.
orderId - Id of the order whos details is requested
